rev.comment: Removed irony (this is a serious article)
rvt same religious bit. Feel free to discuss on the [[Talk:Zoophilia|talk page]] and try to obtain a consensus on the matter 1st. Thanks.

A POV acknowledged forgery should not besmirch established religions
